Welcome to Segwork’s documentation!

Segwork is a Python library that includes a set of tools for semantic segmentation.

Note

This project is part of a Master Thesis for the European Master in Software Engineering (EMSE).

Indices and tables

  • Index

  • Module Index

  • Search Page

Configurable registry

Classes for the implementation of a registry of components.

Code adapted and extended from https://github.com/todofixthis/class-registry/blob/master/class_registry/registry.py

class segwork.registry.ConfigurableRegistry(class_key: str, attr_args: str = '_default_args', attr_kwargs: str = '_default_kwargs', additional_args=[], **kwargs)

Subclass of ClassRegistry that includes default settings and additional information of the registered class.

add_additional_args(attr_name: str)

Add attribute name to be stored in the registry

get_class(key: Hashable)

Get class for the specified key.

Raise:

KeyError

get_instance(key: Hashable, *args, **kwargs)

Get instance of class with default params

Raise:

KeyError

get_subfield(key: Hashable, subkey: Hashable, default: Optional[Any] = None)

Get subfield for the specified key

Raise:

KeyError

set_field(key: Hashable, subkey: Hashable, value: Any, update: bool = True)

Set field of registry
